# Домашнее задание к занятию "14.1 Создание и использование секретов"

## Задача 1: Работа с секретами через утилиту kubectl в установленном minikube

```
root@node1:~# openssl genrsa -out cert.key 4096
Generating RSA private key, 4096 bit long modulus (2 primes)
............................................................++++
...........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................++++
e is 65537 (0x010001)
root@node1:~# openssl req -x509 -new -key cert.key -days 3650 -out cert.crt \
-subj '/C=RU/ST=Moscow/L=Moscow/CN=server.local'
root@node1:~# kubectl create secret tls domain-cert --cert=cert.crt --key=cert.key
secret/domain-cert created
root@node1:~# kubectl get secrets
NAME                               TYPE                 DATA   AGE
domain-cert                        kubernetes.io/tls    2      12s
sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1   helm.sh/release.v1   1      17d
root@node1:~# kubectl get secret
NAME                               TYPE                 DATA   AGE
domain-cert                        kubernetes.io/tls    2      22s
sh.helm.release.v1.nfs-server.v1   helm.sh/release.v1   1      17d
root@node1:~# kubectl get secret domain-cert
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      36s
root@node1:~# kubectl describe secret domain-cert
Name:         domain-cert
Namespace:    default
Labels:       <none>
Annotations:  <none>

Type:  kubernetes.io/tls

Data
====
tls.crt:  1944 bytes
tls.key:  3247 bytes
root@node1:~# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml
apiVersion: v1
data:
  tls.crt: 
  tls.key: 
kind: Secret
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: "2022-12-10T14:34:16Z"
  name: domain-cert
  namespace: default
  resourceVersion: "4676480"
  uid: d786928b-308f-42ab-bc80-3b42d200bcdd
type: kubernetes.io/tls
root@node1:~# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o json
{
    "apiVersion": "v1",
    "data": {
        "tls.crt": "",
        "tls.key": ""
    },
    "kind": "Secret",
    "metadata": {
        "creationTimestamp": "2022-12-10T14:34:16Z",
        "name": "domain-cert",
        "namespace": "default",
        "resourceVersion": "4676480",
        "uid": "d786928b-308f-42ab-bc80-3b42d200bcdd"
    },
    "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
}
root@node1:~# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o json > secret.json
root@node1:~# kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml > secret.yaml
root@node1:~# kubectl delete secret domain-cert
secret "domain-cert" deleted
root@node1:~# kubectl apply -f secret.yaml
secret/domain-cert created
```
